author: newsr.in
title: Taylor Swift Bought a $25 Million (€22.3 Million) Mansion, Lied About It
text: If there’s one thing that Taylor Swift hates is having the media say about her that she’s like a crazy stalker who buys a house next to her boyfriend’s, within weeks of dating. So when word got out last week that she was looking at a new Beverly Hills mansion and making wedding plans, she rushed to deny both rumors. As it turns out, one of them was true: Taylor was looking to buy an impressive $25 million (€22.3 million) mansion in Beverly Hills, and TMZ found the... »
